name: UE5 - Cannon Ball Brick Breaker - Demo
name_original: UE5 - Cannon Ball Brick Breaker - Demo
description: This game was fully made by me in Unreal Engine. I enjoyed developing it and will be adding things to it in the future. Please let me know what you think of it in the comments. The aim of the game is to break all the bricks before they reach the bottom of the screen. Sometimes if you are lucky you will receive a nuke ball which will instantly destroy a brick.  (Nuke balls are completely random)
